verses.verse: Bless <WH1288> <WH8761> the YY <WH3068>, O my soul <WH5315>. O YY <WH3068> my 'Elohim <WH430>, thou art very <WH3966> great <WH1431> <WH8804>; thou art clothed <WH3847> <WH8804> with honour <WH1935> and majesty <WH1926>.
Who coverest <WH5844> <WH8802> thyself with light <WH216> as with a garment <WH8008>: who stretchest out <WH5186> <WH8802> the heavens <WH8064> like a parokhet <WH3407>:

Who layeth the beams <WH7136> <WH8764> of his chambers <WH5944> in the waters <WH4325>: who maketh <WH7760> <WH8802> the clouds <WH5645> his chariot <WH7398>: who walketh <WH1980> <WH8764> upon the wings <WH3671> of the wind <WH7307>:
Who maketh <WH6213> <WH8802> his angels <WH4397> spirits <WH7307>; his ministers <WH8334> <WH8764> a flaming <WH3857> <WH8802> fire <WH784>:
Who laid <WH3245> <WH8804> the foundations <WH4349> of the earth <WH776>, that it should not be removed <WH4131> <WH8735> for ever <WH5769> <WH5703>.
Thou coveredst <WH3680> <WH8765> it with the deep <WH8415> as with a garment <WH3830>: the waters <WH4325> stood <WH5975> <WH8799> above the mountains <WH2022>.
At <WH4480> thy rebuke <WH1606> they fled <WH5127> <WH8799>; at the voice <WH6963> of thy thunder <WH7482> they hasted <WH2648> <WH8735> away.
They go up <WH5927> <WH8799> by the mountains <WH2022>; they go down <WH3381> <WH8799> by the valleys <WH1237> unto the place <WH4725> which <WH2088> thou hast founded <WH3245> <WH8804> for them.
Thou hast set <WH7760> <WH8804> a bound <WH1366> that they may not pass over <WH5674> <WH8799>; that they turn not again <WH7725> <WH8799> to cover <WH3680> <WH8763> the earth <WH776>.
He sendeth <WH7971> <WH8764> the springs <WH4599> into the valleys <WH5158>, which run <WH1980> <WH8762> among the hills <WH2022>.
They give drink <WH8248> <WH8686> to every beast <WH2416> of the field <WH7704>: the wild asses <WH6501> quench <WH7665> <WH8799> their thirst <WH6772>.
By them shall the fowls <WH5775> of the heaven <WH8064> have their habitation <WH7931> <WH8799>, which sing <WH5414> <WH8799> <WH6963> among <WH996> the branches <WH6073>.
He watereth <WH8248> <WH8688> the hills <WH2022> from his chambers <WH5944>: the earth <WH776> is satisfied <WH7646> <WH8799> with the fruit <WH6529> of thy works <WH4639>.

He causeht the grass <WH2682> to grow <WH6779> <WH8688> for the cattle <WH929>, and herb <WH6212> for the service <WH5656> of man <WH120>: that he may bring forth <WH3318> <WH8687> food <WH3899> out of the earth <WH776>;

And wine <WH3196> that maketh glad <WH8055> <WH8762> the heart <WH3824> of man <WH582>, and oil <WH8081> to make his face <WH6440> to shine <WH6670> <WH8687>, and bread <WH3899> which strengtheneth <WH5582> <WH8799> man's <WH582> heart <WH3824>.
The trees <WH6086> of the YY <WH3068> are full <WH7646> <WH8799> of sap; the cedars <WH730> of Lebanon <WH3844>, which he hath planted <WH5193> <WH8804>;
Where the birds <WH6833> make their nests <WH7077> <WH8762>: as for the stork <WH2624>, the fir trees <WH1265> are her house <WH1004>.
The high <WH1364> hills <WH2022> are a refuge <WH4268> for the wild goats <WH3277>; and the rocks <WH5553> for the conies <WH8227>.
He appointed <WH6213> <WH8804> the moon <WH3394> for seasons <WH4150>: the sun <WH8121> knoweth <WH3045> <WH8804> his going down <WH3996>.
Thou makest <WH7896> <WH8799> darkness <WH2822>, and it is night <WH3915>: wherein all the beasts <WH2416> of the forest <WH3293> do creep <WH7430> <WH8799> forth.
The young lions <WH3715> roar <WH7580> <WH8802> after their prey <WH2964>, and seek <WH1245> <WH8763> their meat <WH400> from 'Elohim <WH410>.
The sun <WH8121> ariseht <WH2224> <WH8799>, they gather themselves together <WH622> <WH8735>, and lay them down <WH7257> <WH8799> in their dens <WH4585>.
Man <WH120> goeth forth <WH3318> <WH8799> unto his work <WH6467> and to his labour <WH5656> until the evening <WH6153>.

O YY <WH3068>, how manifold <WH7231> <WH8804> are thy works <WH4639> ! in wisdom <WH2451> hast thou made <WH6213> <WH8804> them all: the earth <WH776> is full <WH4390> <WH8804> of thy riches <WH7075>.
So is this great <WH1419> and wide <WH7342> <WH3027> sea <WH3220>, wherein are things creeping <WH7431> innumerable <WH4557>, both small <WH6996> and great <WH1419> beasts <WH2416>.
There go <WH1980> <WH8762> the ships <WH591>: there is that leviathan <WH3882>, whom thou hast made <WH3335> <WH8804> to play <WH7832> <WH8763> therein.
These wait <WH7663> <WH8762> all upon thee; that thou mayest give <WH5414> <WH8800> them their meat <WH400> in due season <WH6256>.
That thou givest <WH5414> <WH8799> them they gather <WH3950> <WH8799>: thou openest <WH6605> <WH8799> thine hand <WH3027>, they are filled <WH7646> <WH8799> with good <WH2896>.

Thou hidest <WH5641> <WH8686> thy face <WH6440>, they are troubled <WH926> <WH8735>: thou takest away <WH622> <WH8799> their breath <WH7307>, they die <WH1478> <WH8799>, and return <WH7725> <WH8799> to their dust <WH6083>.
Thou sendest <WH7971> <WH8762> forth thy spirit <WH7307>, they are created <WH1254> <WH8735>: and thou renewest <WH2318> <WH8762> the face <WH6440> of the earth <WH127>.
The glory <WH3519> of the YY <WH3068> shall endure for ever <WH5769>: the YY <WH3068> shall rejoice <WH8055> <WH8799> in his works <WH4639>.
He looketh <WH5027> <WH8688> on the earth <WH776>, and it trembleth <WH7460> <WH8799>: he toucheth <WH5060> <WH8799> the hills <WH2022>, and they smoke <WH6225> <WH8799>.
I will sing <WH7891> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068> as long as I live <WH2416>: I will sing <WH2167> <WH8762> praise to my 'Elohim <WH430> while I have my being <WH5750>.
My meditation <WH7879> of him shall be sweet <WH6149> <WH8799>: I will be glad <WH8055> <WH8799> in the YY <WH3068>.

Let the sinners <WH2400> be consumed <WH8552> <WH8735> out of the earth <WH776>, and let the wicked <WH7563> be no more. Bless <WH1288> <WH8761> thou the YY <WH3068>, O my soul <WH5315>. Praise <WH1984> <WH8761> ye the YY <WH3050>.
